
### position-independent executables  {.smaller}


* so far: executables loaded to fixed (virtual) address 
<hr class="vspace" />
* turns out to be undesirable for easily guessable addresses
* solution: position independent executables 

   * can be loaded at any address at runtime



### position-independent ELF example  {.smaller}



* compiled+linked ‘‘Hello, World’’ with <code>gcc -static-pie</code>
* PIE = position-independent executable
